entry.title: Russia Claims Control of Luhansk as Ukrainian Forces Retreat From Lysychansk
entry.content: The Ukrainian withdrawal effectively placed under Russian control the eastern region at the center of the war in recent months.

entry.title: How Food Became Putin's New Strategic Weapon
entry.content: Russia has used its increased leverage over food exports from Ukraine to divide the international community and expand influence over developing economies in the Middle East, Africa and Asia.
